Summary: in may of 1991 myself and many other people i was with saw a gigantic craft at least a mile long and 500 ft wide from top to bottom,it came from the north east and heading south west , very low , no noise , slow .
divs: sighting detailsi was at an outdoor concert in 1991 with many friends in may of that year.the show had started and about 30 mins into it we noticed something in the sky coming from the north east it was low just above the tree tops as it got closer it became bigger it must have been a mile or so long and from top to bottom 500 ft.we all just starred at it no one really said anything we were kind of shocked at how big this thing was and somebody shouted out "ufo" then i realized what i was looking at.it was maybe a 1\4 mile from us to the south of us heading west when we really got a good look at it.it was so low i thought it was going to crash and kill every one in a mile area but it just flew right on by very slow did not move fast at all made no noise.it looked ancient very very old older than anything i"v ever seen the only straight lines were the outer edges and it kind had an arc to it,the structure of it looked woven together like a gigantic jigsaw puzzle as it passed by we could see the back of it and there was the power source it looked like the color of metal ore with a com trail two miles long we could see the com trail for 20 mins after it flew out of sight to the south west.two years after this i was at work talking about it and my boss pipes up and says he saw the same thing he said"it flew right above his house in bonner springs k.s. saying it was more v shaped and there was a smaller craft right behind it to the right " then it occurred to me that we were only seeing one side of it which being so big it looked cigar shaped but it was actually v shaped he also said there were giant orbs at each corner as big as houses all pulsating and changing colors with one in the middle.
